Desc.entry:
A registered charity which responds to and meets the individual needs of any vulnerable adult or child with a learning disability. The trust aims to provide services where everyone can feel they are a valued member of society and are treated with dignity and respect. Aims to provide a person-centered approach to enabling service users to achieve their maximum potential. Runs a residential care home for 6 adults with learning disabilities. Helps individuals living in the community take part in activities outside and inside their home.
Offers advice and support to people who receive direct payments. Helps individuals to manage their care budget. Will also recruit a personal assistant and employ a personal assistant.
